subject: Re: [junit] Help need how to use JUnit tool in testing COBOL.
msgSnippet: Whoa! That s new! Thanks for pointing that out. I was searching high and low for something like COBOLUnit about 6 months ago, and came up with nothing. We had
messageBody:
Whoa! That's new! Thanks for pointing that out.

I was searching high and low for something like COBOLUnit about 6
months ago, and came up with nothing. We had actually just started to
design something ourselves (a bit simpler than the one on Google Code
appears to be). This might save us a fair amount of work.

Cheers,
Joe

2009/12/7 David Saff <david@...>:
> Although, thanks for the impetus to learn something new to me:
>
> http://sites.google.com/site/cobolunit/
>
>  David Saff
>
> On Mon, Dec 7, 2009 at 6:27 AM, Ilja Preuß <iljapreuss@...> wrote:
>> What's motivating you to use JUnit? Wouldn't it be better to write your
>> tests in COBOL?
>>
>> 2009/12/6 conectme366 <conectme366@...>
>>
>>>
>>>
>>> Hi All,
>>> This is Rocky.I need some help in testing COBOL using JUnit tool.Can anyone
>>> provide some information / manual on this.
>>> Thanks a lot in advance ,
>>> Your information will be highly appreciated.
>>> Best Regards,
>>> Rocky.
